infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos of waste items for identification and reporting.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images of waste items for identification and reporting.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to include location data in reports submitted to admin.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share images of waste items for identification and reporting.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos of waste items for identification and reporting.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to include location data in reports submitted to admin.
